js.content: #! coffeescript key = (n, e) -> div = document.createElement 'div' code = e.which or e.keyCode ary = [n, code, String.fromCharCode(code), e.ctrlKey, e.shiftKey, e.altKey] div.innerHTML = '' + ary.join('') + '' document.body.insertBefore(div, document.body.firstElementChild) for n in ['down', 'press', 'up'] document.addEventListener 'key' + n, key.bind(null, n), false
